title: Find area of a cuboid
contentHtml:
Write a program to find area of a cuboid

Area of cuboid = 2 × (Length × Width + Length × Height + Width × Height)

Length : 2
Width  : 3
Height : 4

Area : 52

markdown:
## Write a program to find area of a cuboid

Area of cuboid = 2 × (`Length` × `Width` + `Length` × `Height` + `Width` × `Height`)

```
Length : 2
Width  : 3
Height : 4

Area : 52
```
